ygData.subject: Vendui'
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of you not learned in the speech of my peoples, that is roughly translated into Commonspeak as Greetings . As it appears that these communications
ygData.messageBody:
For those of you not learned in the speech of my peoples, that is
roughly translated into Commonspeak as "Greetings".

As it appears that these communications run rampant with the confused
and mislead, I wish to inform you that the Father's will shall not be
swayed. You shall be wrapped with the blanket of hate, or be smothered
by it.

I shall continue watching you... as do my brethren. Count your useless
blessings that we are only watching, for when we strike it will be with
no mercy.

-Negfleisch
Wanre of Orthae Velve

(/ooc I'm one of those freaks that is not content with one character.
Maybe it's my multiple personalities or maybe I was dropped one to many
times on my head *grin*. Anyway, my two primary characters are the
dark elf warrior Negfleisch and the half elf bard Jantis Eorl. Good to
[sort of] meet you all. -Drew Dunlap)
